project.name: MySQL
project.description: The Gentoo MySQL Team is responsible for delivering high-quality support for the MySQL RDBMS (Relational DataBase Management System) for Gentoo Linux.

p.b: What we do, and who we are

longdescription.p: The Gentoo MySQL Team looks after the packages for the MySQL RDBMS. MySQL is by far the most important and popular RDBMS for web-based applications, and is the 'M' in the LAMP stack.
We're also onhand to provide information and support on MySQL to other Gentoo developers.

project.goals: Our goal is to ensure that Gentoo provides the best environment possible for developing and running software based on MySQL.

body.p: We provide regular status updates covering what the Gentoo MySQL Team has accomplished since the previous status update. It is written by one of the team members and contains a quick overview of recent progress.
